text: Agdistis nigra is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Cyprus and Israel. The wingspan is about 18 mm. The forewings and hindwings are dark grey.Die palaearktischen Agdistis -Arten (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths described in 1955
title: Agdistis nigra
